item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Pilot flying Helene rescue missions in NC threatened with arrest (62 points | 26 comments)
2. Experimental web browser optimized for rabbit-holing (33 points | 5 comments)
3. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (319 points | 118 comments)
4. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (237 points | 20 comments)
5. Were RNNs all we needed? (354 points | 155 comments)
6. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (995 points | 302 comments)
7. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (752 points | 544 comments)
8. The Silk Road (2023) (18 points | 1 comment)
9. 159 employees are leaving Automattic as CEO’s fight with WP Engine escalates (12 points | 2 comments)
10. Go Concurrency vs. RxJS (30 points | 29 comments)
11. Correcting the record for Continue and PearAI (88 points | 56 comments)
12. IRS Direct File adds 12 additional states, covers more tax situations in 2025 (86 points | 30 comments)
13. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (152 points | 74 comments)
14. The Heart of Unix (2018) (115 points | 55 comments)
15. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (40 points | 10 comments)
16. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (89 points | 29 comments)
17. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (129 points | 35 comments)
18. The Unraveling of Space-Time (62 points | 42 comments)
19. Ask HN: What are your favorite DIY kits? (17 points | 10 comments)
20. Personal Names Around the World (2011) (39 points | 15 comments)
21. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (176 points | 209 comments)
22. Why does Lisp use cons cells? (1998) (31 points | 17 comments)
23. Interviewing for Evidence (18 points | 5 comments)
24. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
25. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (42 points | 5 comments)
26. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (45 points | 8 comments)
27. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (259 points | 140 comments)
28. HTTrack Website Copier (73 points | 16 comments)
29. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (44 points | 11 comments)
30. New research says blue zones can be explained by comically flawed data (8 points | discuss)
